title: Womens Dress
title_original: Indian Bollywood Stylish Designer Ready to Wear Lehenga Choli Party Wear Pakistani Beautiful Choli

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #958,214 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #7,180 in Women's Formal Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Formal

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the lehenga choli set beautiful and appreciate its amazing quality with neat stitching.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The seller offers to tailor the dress for you!
items.body: The quality and detail of this dress are absolutely stunning. The stitching is neat, the fabric feels luxurious, and the design is exactly as pictured. You can tell a lot of care and skill went into making it. The seller was incredibly kind and responsive, going above and beyond to make sure I was happy with my purchase. I truly appreciate their dedication and professionalism. Highly recommend this shop for anyone looking for beautiful, well-made traditional wear! Read more
items.author: RanXin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible experience
items.body: Every element of this purchase was positive. After purchasing, the seller reached out with the option of me giving my specific measurements (versus the more generic presized options) and checked in on my delivery deadline. Communication was prompt and clear. I am legitimately shocked by how quickly I received my order given that I went the bespoke route. The quality is lovely, with a lot of visual detail from the clothing print, thread, and sequins. Each item fits well and according to my measurements. All in all I am so grateful for the quality of this experience, especially given the price. Read more
items.author: Julie A. Gruca

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Lehnga
items.body: Excellent service and quality, received product on time! Read more
items.author: NoBaggage

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty!
items.body: Arrived in a very timely manner, and the fabric was beautiful! Got a lot of compliments at the wedding. The skirt was a bit longer than I expected so I ended up hemming it myself, and I also altered the choli (top garment) length to be shorter as well. All in all, nothing that a few safety pins and fabric tape couldn't fix! Overall I'm happy with the purchase. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing quality!
items.body: I was a little nervous about purchasing this lehenga because there weren’t many reviews or pictures about this but it was SO WORTH IT! The seller contacted me about measurements which I was a little iffy at first because not many sellers would ask for specific measurements but when I tried it on for the first time, it fit like a glove! It did come with sleeves (which I’m 100% sure was my fault because I gave measurements for it to have sleeves and didn’t think twice about it) so I did cut off the sleeves and hemmed it to my liking. It was also such good quality and everyone at the wedding loved it! Also, it got shipped and delivered pretty quickly too! I’m so happy I purchased this product! Read more
items.author: Kelly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality for price is better than what I found in stores
items.body: Beautiful lehenga for attending a wedding in South India. I couldn't find anything as nice for this price in U.S.-based stores. The dress was beautifully packaged, easy to open, and wrinkle-free. I was impressed that the seller delivered to my hotel in India so that the dress was waiting for me upon arrival. Measurements matched those which I personally provided the seller and the waist is adjustable which is great because I needed extra room at 6 months pregnant. Seller provided excellent communication and customer service, a service unlike I have ever had with an Amazon purchase. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Lippie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant !
items.body: If I could charge a dollar for every compliment I got for this outfit I would be a millionaire right now ! Beautiful outfit! I needed it for a Diwali party and it did not disappoint! Big thanks to the seller for reaching out to me before shipping the outfit and was able to make some adjustments to my top and was a perfect fit ! I would absolutely definitely shop here again ! Read more
items.author: SALOME

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So pretty but size up!
items.body: Gorgeous dress but even with the provided sizes the top portion was too small. Could have been user error but I measured exactly what the images had you measure. I had to get it tailored but it arrived before the anticipated date. Read more
items.author: Placeholder

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 6 US Small (Chest-38 Waist-34), Customize Stitch, Kids wear customization, Unstitch, Unstitched.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Choice 17, Choice 5, Choice 16, Choice 6, Choice 19, Choice 3, Choice 18, Choice 4, Choice 1, Choice 13, Choice 2, Choice 15, Choice 14, Choice 9. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
